PROFILE_HELP_USAGE: Change the color for your rank card.```/profile color <color>```
Change the opacity for your rank card.```/profile opacity <0-100>```
Change the background for your rank card.```/profile background <url>```
Change the overlay for your rank card.```/profile opacity <url>```
PROFILE_IS_NOT_COLOR:
Unable to find the given color '%s'. Please select a color from one of the following colors:```default
blue
gray
green
orange
pink
purple
red
teal
yellow```
PROFILE_IS_NOT_HEX: Color '%s' is not a hex color. Please make sure the color follows a hex color format (#6cffac).
PROFILE_COLOR_SUCCESS: Profile color has been updated to **%s**.
PROFILE_IMAGE_INVALID: Given link is not an image, please provide a valid image link.
PROFILE_DONATOR_ONLY: This feature is only available for donator. Find out more information using `/donate`
PROFILE_BACKGROUND_DEFAULT_SUCCESS: Profile background has been set back to default.
PROFILE_BACKGROUND_SUCCESS: Background has been uploaded to the database.
PROFILE_OVERLAY_DEFAULT_SUCCESS: Profile overlay has been set back to default.
PROFILE_OVERLAY_SUCCESS: Overlay has been uploaded to the database.
PROFILE_DISCORD_TOS: By continuing you understand the image you are uploading follows the **[Discord's Terms of Service](https://discord.com/terms)**. Anything that is uploaded is your responsibility and you will be held accountable for it.
PROFILE_NSFW_WARNING: WARNING! NSFW images can result in a ban from our bot.
PROFILE_OPACITY_TOO_HIGH: Please make sure the opacity is between 0 and 100.
PROFILE_OPACITY_SUCCESS: Profile opacity has been set to **%s%**.
